name: The Jarl
description:
The Jarl

The Jarl is a text based game where you have to build your viking empire from the bottom.

Manage the city resources to survive in this dangerous era.

The game will end when you reach a population of 1000 and explored all your surroundings.

This game was made in a week for the Text Only Game Jam (https://itch.io/jam/text-only-jam-2)

Credits

The music is from: Alexander Nakarada from this link (https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com/royalty-free-music/celtic-fantasy)

Music: Several songs by Alexander Nakarada (www.serpentsoundstudios.com)
